title: Termius SSH Key Format Requirements
description: Critical: Termius requires RSA keys in PEM format, NOT ED25519 in OpenSSH format. Must use: ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -m PEM. Wasted time guessing instead of researching documentation first. This should be checked before attempting SSH key generation for mobile clients.

solution.description: Generate RSA 4096-bit key in PEM format using: ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -f ~/.ssh/id_termius_rsa -m PEM -N ''. Add public key to authorized_keys. Copy private key to Termius. Delete private key from server.
